SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS notice_id, subject, concat(concat(DATE_FORMAT(stt_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ '), DATE_FORMAT(end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) noti_dt, use_yn, qry_cnt, reg_id, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, chg_id, DATE_FORMAT(chg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') chg_dt, (SELECT count(file_id) FROM sys_notice_file_m WHERE notice_id = t1.notice_id) attach FROM sys_notice_m t1 WHERE use_yn = 'Y'
and subject like concat('%', #{search_text}, '%')
and reg_id like concat('%', #{search_text}, '%')
and contents like concat('%', #{search_text}, '%')
ORDER BY notice_id desc LIMIT ${_start==null ? 0 : _start} , ${_rows==null ? 20 : _rows}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO sys_notice_m( subject, contents, stt_dt, end_dt, reg_id,reg_dt,chg_id,chg_dt )VALUES( #{subject}, #{contents}, #{stt_dt}, concat(#{end_dt},' 23:59:59'), #{session.user_id}, now(), #{session.user_id}, now() )

UNION ALL SELECT #{loop.id},#{loop.name},#{loop.ext},#{loop.path},#{loop.size},concat('t1_', last_insert_id())
UNION ALL SELECT #{loop.id},#{loop.name},#{loop.ext},#{loop.path},#{loop.size},concat('t2_', last_insert_id())
UNION ALL SELECT #{loop.id},#{loop.name},#{loop.ext},#{loop.path},#{loop.size},concat('f1_', last_insert_id())

UPDATE sys_notice_m SET subject = #{subject}, contents = #{contents}, stt_dt = #{stt_dt}, end_dt = concat(#{end_dt},' 23:59:59'), chg_id = #{session.user_id}, chg_dt = now() WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
